title: Tomato Social Club
description: Fullstack Web-first application for food delivery built using the MERN stack. The platform provides a seamless and intuitive experience for customers. Integrated Stripe payment processing, ensures secure and efficient transactions.
technology: React.js: Builds the interactive and responsive user interface.
Node.js: Serves as the runtime environment for executing server-side code.
Express.js: Handles routing, middleware, and server logic.
MongoDB: Utilized as the NoSQL database to store user, restaurant, and order data.
Stripe API: Payment Integration with Stripe API facilitates secure and efficient payment processing for transactions on the platform.

title: Mobile Wallet App
description: Developed using React Native for mobile interface development, the app allows users to scroll through their stack of cards, simulating a smooth and interactive experience inspired by the original Apple Wallet. It demonstrates the integration of animated interactions and gesture handling to create a polished and engaging user experience.
technology: React Native: Used for building the cross-platform mobile application with a focus on performance and native-like UI experience.
Reanimated: Enables smooth animations and interactions, providing fluid, natural movement for the card-swiping and scrolling effects.
Gesture Handler: Simplifies touch interactions like swiping and scrolling without performance loss.

title: Dev Roast
description: Dev Roast is an interactive web-first application game survey. It combines the power of React.js, Tailwind CSS, and a dynamic JSON server to deliver a seamless quiz experience.
technology: React.js: Provides a dynamic user interface, allowing for smooth interactions and updates. The application executes full CRUD operations through React components.
JSON Server: Serves as a lightweight backend, managing and updating questions and user data, which enables the application to handle CRUD operations seamlessly.
Axios: Used for making HTTP requests to the JSON server, enabling efficient data retrieval and updates.

title: Pour Decisions
description: Pour Decisions is a cocktail recipes application built using React.js. With a focus on user-generated content, this application allows you to add your own recipes which you can save to your cocktail collection. The user can also browse through a prexisting collection of recipes.
technology: React.js: Provides a dynamic and responsive user interface, allowing for smooth interactions and updates.
In-Browser Storage: User-generated recipes and application data are stored temporarily in the browser. Data will be lost upon refreshing the page.

title: Fluffy Dog
description: Fluffy Dog is a 2D game web application developed using DOM manipulation techniques and vanilla Javascript. Inspired by the classic Flappy Bird, this game brings a delightful twist with a charming canine protagonist. In Fluffy Dog, players guide the dog through a series of obstacles, aiming to achieve the highest score possible.
technology: HTML5: Structures the game's content and elements.
CSS3: Styles the game, enhancing visual appeal and responsiveness.
JavaScript: Powers the game's logic and interactivity through DOM manipulation.
